modName: Dragon Priest Hood Retexture --- Plus Mask
summary:
Re-texture that should work for the 8 Dragon priest hood
I might add one for the dragonpriesthoodultra.dds later on
descriptionHtml:
Re-texture that should work for the 8 Dragon priest hood
I might add one for the dragonpriesthoodultra.dds later on
Extract files from zip to \"data\" merge and overwrite if necessary

Added new texture for the mask due to request (:
It will overwrite all of the 8 textures. If You don\'t want it to overwrite a certain mask, just delete the associated .dds helmet texture 
Comment for any suggestions :)
author: LadrayTheDruid

files.name: Mask re-texture anbu black ops mask
files.fileName: Mask re-texture anbu black ops mask -879-1-0.zip
